title: JavaScript Fundamentals Hands-on
description: In this lab, we will explore and practice various JavaScript programming concepts such as array manipulation, object creation, and function composition. The purpose of this lab is to help you develop your skills in JavaScript programming by providing hands-on exercises that cover fundamental concepts. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to use JavaScript to solve common programming problems.

meta.title: JavaScript Programming | Fundamental Concepts & Hands-on Exercises
meta.description: Explore and practice JavaScript programming fundamentals, including array manipulation, object creation, and function composition. Develop your coding skills with hands-on exercises.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, Programming, Coding, Array, Object, Function, Hands-on, Exercises

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: JavaScript 基础实践
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索并实践各种 JavaScript 编程概念，如数组操作、对象创建和函数组合。本实验的目的是通过提供涵盖基本概念的实践练习，帮助你提升 JavaScript 编程技能。完成本实验后，你将更好地理解如何使用 JavaScript 解决常见的编程问题。

meta.title: JavaScript 编程 | 基础概念与实践练习
meta.description: 探索并实践 JavaScript 编程基础，包括数组操作、对象创建和函数组合。通过实践练习提升你的编码技能。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, 编程, 编码, 数组, 对象, 函数, 实践, 练习

verify.name: 验证 Node 命令用法
verify.hint: 在终端/SSH 中输入 'node' 并回车，即可运行 JavaScript。
